root: ^Hello, I heard you are an expert in magic. Can you teach me a bit about it?
^Of course, my dear! I am always thrilled to share my knowledge with those who seek it. Magic can be a formidable weapon against demons. Are you prepared to embark on this journey?
^Absolutely! I am ready to learn. Tell me, what elements can I master?
^There are ten elements that you can master, my prodigy. They are Water, Wind, Earth, Fire, Thunder, Ice, Nature, Holy, Dark, and Acid. Each of them has its unique abilities and strengths.
^With the right combination, you can become a formidable magic wielder.
